meanings.definition: The quality of being strange or frightening.
meanings.sent1: The eerinesses of the dark forest made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a lot of eerinesses that kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent3: The Halloween decorations added a touch of eerinesses to the party.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was filled with eerinesses, like whispers in the walls.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the graveyard was filled with eerie eerinesses.

meanings.definition: The feeling of unease or fear caused by something mysterious or supernatural.
meanings.sent1: Walking through the old cemetery, I felt eerie eerinesses creeping up my spine.
meanings.sent2: The eerie eerinesses in the haunted house made my heart race.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sudden appearance gave me a start, adding to the eerinesses of the night.
meanings.sent4: The fog enveloped the town, creating an atmosphere of eerie eerinesses.
meanings.sent5: The eerie eerinesses of the ghost story lingered in my mind long after it was told.
